item.title: Understand How Cloth Is Made
item.description:
So while shopping for my pajyamas today, was thinking how this cloth is made. After searching on youtube these few videos made it easier to understand.

First part is getting raw, either by cotton tree, or silk worm or cashmere/kashmir goats or sheeps etc.

On simple human level

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2LuuFXFDLDY

Less than industrial but on large scale

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OHbJQ90hfY
